item.description:
Because of a scheduling conflict, I've changed the reservation to SATURDAY NOVEMBER 13 at 7pm


For November's dinner, let's go to DeWolf Tavern in Bristol RI

I've never eaten here but I've heard so many good things about the restaurant

http://www.dewolftave...

And November 5th - 14th is Newport/Bristol Restaurant Week!
DeWolf is offering a special 3 course dinner for $30. Check it out on their website under "menus"

Hope you can make it !
item.how_to_find_us: a reservation has been made in my name

group.name: Rhode Island Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: November Dinner - DeWolf Tavern in Bristol
